basics.name: Sivvani Muthusamy
basics.summary: Second-year MRSD student at CMU, passionate about perception, localization, and advancing robotics technology.

work.name: Nissan Advanced Technology Center
work.summary: Developed solutions for GPS-denied indoor navigation using fiducial markers and minimal onboard sensing, improving localization accuracy by 10 cm.

work.name: CMU MRSD Capstone Project
work.summary: Generated bird's-eye view (BEV) representations for seamless teleoperation in vehicle parking using infrastructure cameras.

awards.title: KCMET Scholarship for Post Graduate Studies Abroad
awards.summary: Awarded the prestigious KC Mahindra scholarship for postgraduate studies abroad. Ranked among the top 2% of 2000+ participants across India.

awards.title: DAAD WISE Research Fellowship
awards.summary: Recipient of the DAAD WISE fellowship for fully funded undergraduate research. Pursued a research internship at the Munich Institute of Robotics and Machine Intelligence, Technical University of Munich, Germany.

awards.title: NTU India Connect Research Fellowship
awards.summary: Recipient of the NTU India Connect fellowship for fully funded undergraduate research. Conducted research at the School of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore.

awards.title: Institute Award
awards.summary: Received an honorary award for achieving Rank 1 in my department for the second year.

publications.name: Cognitive Intelligence in Industrial Robots and Manufacturing
publications.summary: Highlights the synergy between AI and human cognition to address uncertainties in autonomous manufacturing.

publications.name: Measurement of Sub-Foveal Choroidal Thickness
publications.summary: Introduces a semi-automated method to quantify sub-foveal choroidal thickness using ocular biometry.

leadership.title: Treasurer
leadership.summary: Spearheaded club projects, delegated events, and hosted workshops reaching 3000+ students.
highlights: Organized Genesis’2021 workshop and taught robot simulation using Vrep to 600+ undergrads.
Lectured in 10+ knowledge-sharing sessions and mentored 4 undergrads on an active campus development project.
Achieved Top 20 pre-finalist position in e-Yantra Robotics Competition (eYRC), a National level Robotics competition hosted by IIT Bombay with 2000+ participants.

leadership.title: Manager
leadership.summary: Orchestrated MoUs and conducted webinars & info sessions impacting 7000+ students.
highlights: Launched Mock Interview Series initiative with renowned alumni, benefiting job-seeking students in 2021.
Ensured smooth functioning of student-run technical clubs and organized events like Gamescape and InHott’21 in association with Pragyan.

leadership.title: Coordinator
leadership.summary: Devised financial plans, curated bills, and handled transactions for Asia’s largest ISO-certified student-run techno-managerial fest with 40,000+ participants.
highlights: Monitored financial and investor relations for Pragyan, ensuring efficient risk management.

leadership.title: Excomm Member
leadership.summary: Launched research portfolio and project-seeking websites while organizing webinars & info sessions.
highlights: Worked to find prospective collaborations for NIT-T with international institutes for higher studies and internships.
Contributed to a 5% increment in international student admissions at NIT-T during the 2020-2021 term.

leadership.title: Community Volunteer
leadership.summary: Organized awareness programs, blood donation camps, plantation drives, and cleanliness campaigns.
highlights: Engaged in social work within college grounds and nearby villages adopted by the university.
